description:
☀️🏖🍉 Now that I have your attention. 

HI 👋🏼 your friendly neighborhood CRAZY conspiracy theorist here to tell you for the 7,385th time that this is a freaking scam and WE HAVE BEEN LIED TO.

The Centers for Disease Control sneakily altered the information showing how many people who died from COVID-19 had underlying medical conditions that contributed to their death. 

According to the CDC 9,683 died in the United States with ONLY having COVID-19 listed on their death certificate.

Y’ALL👏🏼LISTEN👏🏼TO👏🏼ME👏🏼👏🏼

Less than 10,000 people.
Do you realize what we accepted and what we gladly gave up, for the past 6 months?

Over a LIE.
We got PLAYED.
Six percent, friends. Six freaking percent.
The jig is up.
The truth is out.
Stop being scared of each other and of a virus.
Stop handing over your freedoms.
Stop snitchin’ on your neighbor.
Stop complying with illogical policies/restrictions.
Take off your masks.
Come out of your houses.
SMILE and HUG one another again.

Hold these trash public servants and “experts” accountable for the FRAUD and ABUSE they have forced on us this year. 

Full report here >> https://www.cdc.gov/nchs/nvss/vsrr/covid_weekly/index.htm?fbclid=IwAR3-wrg3tTKK5-9tOHPGAHWFVO3DfslkJ0KsDEPQpWmPbKtp6EsoVV2Qs1Q
